title: Most menu actions should be disabled for custom files from repository
description: Bug 18016: Most menu actions should be disabled for custom files from the repository, but the rest is meaningless and they should be removed.
OB: When attempting to perform various menu actions on a custom file from the repository, all options are enabled, contrary to the expected behavior.
EB: Menu actions for custom files from the repository should be appropriately disabled, excluding any meaningful actions. Extraneous or irrelevant menu options should be removed.
SR:
1. Open the repository view.
2. Navigate to a .java file and attempt various menu actions to observe their status.
